name: Speed Me Need
description:
A PSX-style game for the Untitled Game Jam

I chose the theme S P E E D

Move with WSAD or the arrow keys

this is my first project in unity

models used:

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/psx-graphics-low-poly-woman-free-download-08dea1...

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/ps1-nissan-v16-094472e6e93d49348ce6bdfb5590c123

https://elegantcrow.itch.io/psx-retro-style-tree-pack

https://ggbot.itch.io/psx-style-cars

https://obliviist.itch.io/ps1psx-style-alpaca-capybara-models

and there's a hidden mario from https://www.models-resource.com/arcade/mariokartarcadegp2/model/6139/
